name: Idle Baker Boss
description:
Grow your franchise and manage a bakery in Idle Baker Boss, a new idle game. Unlock over 150 recipes from cookies, muffins and donuts to extravagant cakes and pies.

Gain coins and sell your store to grow your tycoon empire. Gifts allow you to unlock special rare recipes which you can sell for higher profits. You can bake common, Tasty (uncommon), Yummy (rare), Decadent (epic) and Exquisite (legendary) desserts. Display your baked goods for sale in special display cases to increase your profits. Hire bakers, cashiers and managers to run your bakery and let it run idle while you are offline making you coins and gems while are you away and become a true tycoon of the baking world.

Features:

Over 150 cute desserts to collect
Periodic Events year round
Daily Challenges
Over 100 Awards to collect
Prestige / Ascension System.
Managers that earn you in game cash while you are away (Offline).
Inventory System with Display Cases
No Internet connection requirement
Different Franchise with unique recipes to unlock
Skill Tree system
Portrait / TATE Support

Idle Baker Boss is great for casual gamers and fans of idle clicker games and appeals to those who like to maximize efficiency and profits. Bake your way to the top of the industry. If you love to see numbers go up (NGU), are a fan of idle games or incremental games and cute desserts, this game is for you!
